TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Matanki, title = Matanki, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matanki} }

S.FORM: Matanki Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hualien ko Matanki a niyaro', 121 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 331 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 322 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 79%, Amis2%, Tayal 5%, Seediq 3%, Bunun 1%, Paiwan 2%, roma 8%.

Matanki Itiniay i Wanrong Cen no Hoalien ko Matanki a niyaro', 121 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 331 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 322 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 9 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 79%, Amis2%, Tayal 5%, Seediq 3%, Bonon 1%, Paiwan 2%, roma 8%.
